description:
This year’s The Strangers: Chapter 1 received mixed reviews from fans and critics, but nonetheless managed to have a profitable run at the box office. This is a positive first step for Lionsgate’s plans to reboot the franchise, which include releasing an entire new trilogy of Strangers films. Now the next film in this trilogy, [...]

The post ‘The Strangers: Chapter 2’ First Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Strangers: Chapter 2’ First Trailer Released

description:
The animated classic Snow White is one of Disney‘s next titles receiving the live-action treatment. Their new adaptation has been in production for quite some time, with Rachel Zegler set to portray the titular princess. However, there has been some backlash given that Zegler is a Latina actress, and now she has commented on the [...]

The post ‘Snow White’ Star Rachel Zegler Explains “Skin As White As Snow” Change appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Snow White’ Star Rachel Zegler Explains “Skin As White As Snow” Change

description:
The 1991 book American Psycho, written by Bret Easton Ellis, was a rather influential novel. It would inspire the 2000 film of the same name, among multiple other projects, and now it’s been revealed a new film adaptation of American Psycho is currently in the works. The property has previously been the subject of other [...]

The post Luca Guadagnino To Direct New ‘American Psycho’ Movie Adaptation appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Luca Guadagnino To Direct New ‘American Psycho’ Movie Adaptation
